about_the_game:
Welcome to the adrenaline-pumping world of 'RUN ON'!

presenting a permadeath game where players navigate countless obstacles and utilize various items to race to the finish line.

In 'RUN ON,' every second counts when strategizing to conquer challenging terrains. Whether you're a lone wolf striving to surpass yourself or a competitive fighter determined to outdo your friends, the thrilling environment guarantees an exhilarating experience for all.



The current version of 'RUN ON' available on boasts meticulously crafted maps tailored to various difficulty levels, including Easy, Normal, and Hard.
As you move forward, be prepared to encounter obstacles that test your agility and reflexes. But do not afraid of it!



The game's distinctive visuals and playful sounds, along with items, jumps, sliding, and controls, guide you through an enjoyable adventure. While progressing, you'll find faster routes and master efficient shortcuts. Upon completing 'RUN ON,' you can reattempt the challenge, aided by items that help improve your record.



The game offers heart-pounding moments and thrilling escapes filled with triumphant excitement. So, tie your shoelaces, gather your friends, and embark on an unforgettable race. Your journey awaits.

name: RUN ON

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10（64bit）
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: １５ GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 （64bit） ／ /Windows 11（64bit）
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: １６ GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: １５ GB available space

short_description: 'RUN ON' is an energetically vibrant game developed for up to 10 players, inviting you to embark on thrilling solo adventures or prepare to team up with friends.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
